bibl.title: Some Ptolemies.
bibl.note: Unpublished notes, 1984-1989. - 1. Ptolemy I as Herakles [Louvre Ma 3883]. - 2. A Colossal Head of Ptolemy II [J. Paul Getty Museum 76.AA.72]. - 3. Ptolemy III [J. Paul Getty Museum 78.AA.257-258 and 83.AA.205]. - 4. Ptolemy IV and Arsinoe III [J. Paul Getty Museum 83.AA.313.1-2]. - 5. Ptolemy X Alexandros I [J. Paul Getty Museum 83.AA.33]. - 6. A Ptolemy from the Villa dei Papiri.
bibl.seg: Jirí FREL, Studia Varia (Roma, 1994) pp. 99-104, figg. 85-92.
